title: Soul Reaver Draven Voice volume too low
body: hey everyone. Just asking for a quality change and to increase the voice volume on soul reaver Draven slightly. I have the voice volumes turned to 100 but the voice still seems too low. Please help and fix! Unplayable! Want to hear my fav champion and skin quotes with the voiceover effect :(

replies.body: Ill take a look, thanks for the heads up!
OT NGL Thats the best name ever
